text: Omuntu twamulagira okuyisa obulungi bakaddebe, nnyina yamwetikka (yali lubuto lwe) mu buzibu era namuzaala mu buzibu, nga olubuto lwe (n'okumuyonsa) n'okumujja ku mabeere emyezi makumi asatu, okutuusa lwatuuka okukakata kwe naaweza emyaka amakumi ana (omuntu mulamu) agamba nti ayi Mukama omulabirizi wange nsobozesa okwebaza ebyengera byo ebyo bye wangabira ,ne bye wagabira bakadde bange bombi era mbe nga nkola emirimu emirongoofu gyosiima, era nongooseza ezzadde lyange mazima nze nenenyezza nenzira gyoli era mazima nze ndi wa mu basiraamu
